findDistanceFar.Wiki: Wire action is not possible, but the distance where the point can be seen

filteringDistanceHeightUpper.Wiki: Upper height when filtering by rectangle

filteringDistanceHeightLower.Wiki: Bottom height when filtering by rectangle

softlockDistanceHeightUpper.Wiki: Height of the screen range that soft locks the target once captured (top)

softlockDistanceHeightLower.Wiki: Height of the screen range that soft locks the target once captured (bottom)

softlockDistanceWidth.Wiki: Width of the screen range that soft locks the target once captured
